message:
### Error querying database.  Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'prize_num/100
             ,
--   CASE WHEN prize_type=1 or prize_type=4  THEN p' at line 19
### The error may exist in file [D:\ideaspace\spring-could-practice\wy-admin\target\classes\mybatis\mapper\SignMapper.xml]
### The error may involve defaultParameterMap
### The error occurred while setting parameters
### SQL: SELECT  alias AS "会员号",  truename AS "真实姓名",  prize_name AS "奖品名称",  reward_name AS "奖励名称",  investor_tel AS "投资人电话",                "熊猫币"          ， --   CASE WHEN prize_type=0 THEN "无" --   WHEN prize_type=1 THEN "熊猫币" --   WHEN prize_type=2 THEN "优惠券" --   WHEN prize_type=3 THEN "积分" --   WHEN prize_type=4 THEN "现金红包" --   WHEN prize_type=5 THEN "折扣券" --   WHEN prize_type=6 THEN "实物" --   END AS "奖品类型",                           prize_num/100              , --   CASE WHEN prize_type=1 or prize_type=4  THEN prize_num/100 --   ELSE prize_num END AS "奖品数量",   date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(prize_time/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') AS "中奖时间",   date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(prize_time/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s')AS "领奖时间",   date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(prize_time/1000),'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') AS "发货时间",                           "已领取"              , --  CASE WHEN received_state=0 THEN "未领取" --   WHEN received_state=1 THEN "已领取" --   WHEN received_state=2 THEN "已过期" --   END AS "领取状态" ,                           "不需要发货"              , -- CASE WHEN send_state=-1 THEN "不需要发货" --   WHEN send_state=0 THEN "待发货" --   WHEN send_state=1 THEN "已发货" --   END AS "发货状态", investor_emp_relation.epm_name AS "客服姓名" FROM activity_prize_send_record LEFT JOIN investor_emp_relation ON activity_prize_send_record.investor_id = investor_emp_relation.investor_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND prize_type != 0 AND activity_id = 9;
### Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'prize_num/100
             ,
--   CASE WHEN prize_type=1 or prize_type=4  THEN p' at line 19
; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'prize_num/100
             ,
--   CASE WHEN prize_type=1 or prize_type=4  THEN p' at line 19
